verses.verse: Who is this that cometh <S%H935><s%> from Edom <S%H123><s%>, with dyed <S%H2556><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> from Bozrah <S%H1224><s%>? this that is glorious <S%H1921><s%> in his apparel <S%H3830><s%>, marching <S%H6808><s%> in the greatness <S%H7230><s%> of his strength <S%H3581><s%>? I that speak <S%H1696><s%> in righteousness <S%H6666><s%>, mighty <S%H7227><s%> to save <S%H3467><s%>.
Wherefore art thou red <S%H122><s%> in thine apparel <S%H3830><s%>, and thy garments <S%H899><s%> like him that treadeth <S%H1869><s%> in the winevat <S%H1660><s%>?

I have trodden <S%H1869><s%> the winepress <S%H6333><s%> alone <S%H5971><s%>; and of the peoples there was no <S%H376><s%> man with me <S%H1869><s%>: yea, I trod them in mine anger <S%H639><s%>, and trampled <S%H7429><s%> them in my wrath <S%H2534><s%>; and their lifeblood <S%H5332><s%> is sprinkled <S%H5137><s%> upon my garments <S%H899><s%>, and I have stained <S%H1351><s%> all my raiment <S%H4403><s%>.
For the day <S%H3117><s%> of vengeance <S%H5359><s%> was in my heart <S%H3820><s%>, and the year <S%H8141><s%> of my redeemed <S%H1350><s%> is come <S%H935><s%>.

And I looked <S%H5027><s%>, and there was none to help <S%H5826><s%>; and I wondered <S%H8074><s%> that there was none to uphold <S%H5564><s%>: therefore mine own arm <S%H2220><s%> brought salvation <S%H3467><s%> unto me <S%H2534><s%>; and my wrath, it upheld me <S%H5564><s%>.

And I trod down <S%H947><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> in mine anger <S%H639><s%>, and made them drunk <S%H7937><s%> in my wrath <S%H2534><s%>, and I poured <S%H3381><s%> out their lifeblood <S%H5332><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%>.

I will make mention <S%H2142><s%> of the lovingkindnesses <S%H2617><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and the praises <S%H8416><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, according to all that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath bestowed <S%H1580><s%> on us <S%H7227><s%>, and the great goodness <S%H2898><s%> toward the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, which he hath bestowed <S%H1580><s%> on them according to his mercies <S%H7356><s%>, and according to the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of his lovingkindnesses <S%H2617><s%>.
For he said <S%H559><s%>, Surely <S%H5971><s%>, they are my people, children <S%H1121><s%> that will not deal falsely <S%H8266><s%>: so he was their Saviour <S%H3467><s%>.

In all their affliction <S%H6869><s%> he was afflicted <S%H6862><s%>, and the angel <S%H4397><s%> of his presence <S%H6440><s%> saved <S%H3467><s%> them <S%H160><s%>: in his love and in his pity <S%H2551><s%> he redeemed <S%H1350><s%> them <S%H5190><s%>; and he bare them <S%H5375><s%>, and carried them all the days <S%H3117><s%> of old <S%H5769><s%>.

But they rebelled <S%H4784><s%>, and grieved <S%H6087><s%> his holy <S%H6944><s%> Spirit <S%H7307><s%>: therefore he was turned <S%H2015><s%> to be their enemy <S%H341><s%>, and himself fought against them <S%H3898><s%>.

Then he remembered <S%H2142><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of old <S%H5769><s%>, Moses <S%H4872><s%> and his people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H5927><s%>, Where is he that brought them up out of the sea <S%H3220><s%> with the shepherds <S%H7462><s%> of his flock <S%H6629><s%>? where is he that put <S%H7760><s%> his holy <S%H6944><s%> Spirit <S%H7307><s%> in the midst of them <S%H7130><s%>?

that caused his glorious <S%H8597><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%> at the right hand <S%H3225><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>? that divided <S%H1234><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them <S%H6213><s%>, to make himself an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>?
that led <S%H3212><s%> them through the depths <S%H8415><s%>, as a horse <S%H5483><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, so that they stumbled not <S%H3782><s%>?

As the cattle <S%H929><s%> that go down <S%H3381><s%> into the valley <S%H1237><s%>, the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> caused them to rest <S%H5117><s%>; so didst thou lead <S%H5090><s%> thy people <S%H5971><s%>, to make <S%H6213><s%> thyself a glorious <S%H8597><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>.

Look <S%H7200><s%> down <S%H5027><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and behold <S%H7200><s%> from the habitation <S%H2073><s%> of thy holiness <S%H6944><s%> and of thy glory <S%H8597><s%>: where are thy zeal <S%H7068><s%> and thy mighty <S%H1369><s%> acts <S%H1995><s%>? the yearning of thy heart <S%H4578><s%> and thy compassions are restrained toward me <S%H662><s%>.

For <S%H3588><s%> thou art our Father <S%H1><s%>, though Abraham <S%H85><s%> knoweth <S%H3808><s%> us not <S%H3478><s%>, and Israel doth not acknowledge <S%H5234><s%> us <S%H3068><s%>: thou, O Jehovah, art our Father <S%H1><s%>; our Redeemer <S%H1350><s%> from everlasting <S%H5769><s%> is thy name <S%H8034><s%>.

O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, why dost thou make us to err <S%H8582><s%> from thy ways <S%H1870><s%>, and hardenest <S%H7188><s%> our heart <S%H3820><s%> from thy fear <S%H3374><s%>? Return <S%H7725><s%> for thy servants <S%H5650><s%>' sake <S%H7626><s%>, the tribes of thine inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.
Thy holy <S%H6944><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> possessed <S%H3423><s%> it but a little while <S%H4705><s%>: our adversaries <S%H6862><s%> have trodden down <S%H947><s%> thy sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>.
We are become as they over whom thou never <S%H5769><s%> barest rule <S%H4910><s%>, as they that were not called <S%H7121><s%> by thy name <S%H8034><s%>.
